        @RequestMapping(value="/restaurant",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String passRestaurants(@RequestParam
                                                                                                                           java.lang.String name)
        Relays the name of the restaurant and returns restaurant info.
        Parameters:
        name - - Name of the restaurant
        Returns:
        An array containing the restaurants product list with beverages and details.

      • passTypes

        @RequestMapping(value="/beveragetypes",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String passTypes()
        Returns beverage types by request.
        Returns:
        An array containing a list of all beverage types found in the database.

 @ResponseBody

      • findRestaurants

        @RequestMapping(value="/findrestaurants",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String findRestaurants(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                               org.json.simple.JSONObject params)
        Relays search parameters and returns a list of matching restaurants.
        Parameters:
        params - - Search parameters as a JSONObject, with keys: 'types', 'brands', 'serving', 'abvMin', 'abvMax', 'price'.
        Returns:
        An array containing the names of matching restaurants.
